subsection_name: suy-giam-testosterone.json_1_Testosterone decline with age in men
subsection_content:
Over time, the body's organs gradually deteriorate, so they cannot produce the necessary amount of Testosterone for the body to function normally. It is estimated that Testosterone decreases by an average of 1-2% per year and is only about 70% at age 50 and 50% at age 70. The older you are, the faster the rate of Testosterone decline occurs.
The amount of Testosterone in the body often decreases over time
